title: Diamond Cascade Necklace Pendant - A Modern Classic
features: This pendant features a delicate cascade design, meticulously handcrafted to enhance the brilliance of each diamond. The pave setting creates a seamless, shimmering surface. Inspired by the traditional Telugu Haarams, this pendant is given a modern twist.
occasions: Perfect for any occasion - from a grand wedding reception to a casual evening out. Suitable for Muhurtham
or simply to add sparkle to your daily wear.
description: This exquisite diamond pendant is a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality diamonds and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and durability. Its versatile design makes it suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire. A dazzling expression of refined elegance.
